question: With my choice of interdisciplinary foundations, am I limited to the modules that I can view via TUMOnline, or does it go beyond that? Many of the modules listed cannot be found in the module handbook, which makes it impossible to register for a module."
answer: Please read the information under Computer Science -> Language Courses on the following website: https://www.cit.tum.de/cit/studium/studierende/ueberfachliche-grundlagen/
